append.summary: Object converted to string using its toString method. Adds provided object to end of this string. Returns this string
Any amount of objects can be provided as arguments, all of them will be converted to strings. Adds provided strings to end of this string. Returns this string

format.summary: Replaces first {} in this string with provided object converted to string using object's toString method.
Replaces each {} in this string with one of provided objects converted to string using object's toString method.

toUpperCase.summary: Makes all charecters of this string be UPPER CASE.

toLowerCase.summary: Makes all charecters of this string be lower case.

charAt.summary: Returns string that contains character at provided place
charAt.text: For example for string `StoryAnvil`, `charAt(^2)` will return `o`

substring.summary: Returns string that starts with provided character inclusive
substring.text: For example for string `StoryAnvil`, `substring(^2)` will return `oryAnvil`

substring.summary: Returns string that starts with provided character inclusive and ends with second provided character exclusive
substring.text: For example for string `StoryAnvil`, `substring(^2, ^7)` will return `oryAn`

replace.summary: Both arguments are converted to string using their toString methods. All occurences of `from` string will be replaced with `to` string
replace.text: For example for string `StoryAnvil`, `replace("ry", "ly")` will return `StolyAnvil`
